fields.name: activation_email
fields.description: Email sent to users when they sign up. It containts a link so they can activate their email.
fields.subject: Confirmation of email
fields.content:
Hi, {{ user.first_name }}!

Before you can start you use our pages, you will need to confirm your email address. Click the link below to confirm.

Confirm email: http://{{ request.get_host }}/user/activate/{{ token.key }}/

Kind regards,
The team at DSSCDB
fields.html_content:
Hi, {{ user.first_name }}!

Before you can start you use our pages, you will need to confirm your email address. Click the link below to confirm.

Confirm here: http://{{ request.get_host }}/user/activate/{{ token.key }}/

Kind regards,

The team at DSSCDB

fields.name: set_password_email
fields.description: Email sent to users when they have forgot their password. Contains link to a page where they can set a new password.
fields.subject: Forgotten password
fields.content:
Here you have a link to reset your password:

Link: http://{{ request.get_host }}/user/set-password/{{ token.key }}/

Kind regards,
The team at DSSCDB
fields.html_content:
Here you have a link to reset your password:

Link: http://{{ request.get_host }}/user/set-password/{{ token.key }}/

Kind regards,

The team at DSSCDB
